title: Avail 9/1 Roslindale 2BD/2BA New Construction, W/D in Unit, NO Fee!
posting_body: 1- STATION317 is a brand new 21 unit elevator building located on the West Roxbury/ Roslindale line.
Located seconds from the Bellevue commuter rail station with access to downtown Boston in just minutes, and all the amenities of Roslindale Sq just moments away.
Featured are brand new modern finishes with open concept layout and engineered wood flooring throughout.
Kitchens feature European style cabinetry, quartz counters and stainless steel appliances and 5 burner gas range.
Designer tiled baths w/ glass shower enclosures.
In unit laundry, large closets, Central Air and on demand hot water.
Underground garage parking available for rent.
Pets ok with restrictions (dogs under 35lbs only).
Call or email us today to schedule a time to tour this gorgeous new apartment.
FIRST, SECURITY, BROKER FEE DUE WITH 12 MONTH LEASE
